page.title: 17Industrial Visit
page.content: On May 20th we went to visit the local clay works. We were met by Mr. Evans at the training centre. Inside we saw samples of different clays, different things which were made from clay e.g. pipes, pottery, spark plugs and tiles. Around the walls were hung pictures showing the equipment used in the quarries and mining as it used to be done.Upstairs while we had coffee and biscuits we looked at a large map showing all the different parts of the world where the clay was exported. We then went in a mini bus around the works. We went to the quarry first. It was about 4o metres deep and half a mile across.
